body_html:
# -- coding:utf-8 --
import tensorflow as tf
g1 = tf.Graph()
with g1.as_default():
    v = tf.get_variable("v", shape=[1], initializer=tf.zeros_initializer())

body:
```python
# -- coding:utf-8 --
import tensorflow as tf
g1 = tf.Graph()
with g1.as_default():
    v = tf.get_variable("v", shape=[1], initializer=tf.zeros_initializer())
```
